## ğŸ¦ƒ Turkey Talks @showdialog
ğŸ¤— **Tell us what you're thankful for!**  ğŸ¤—

---

Follow along to code a game where a character collects falling objects to reveal 
one thing they are thankful for!

![Project Example](https://github.com/sbannonCN/thanksgiving-test2/blob/master/thanksgivingDemo.gif?raw=true)

## Step 3
ğŸ‚**Code the falling collectible** ğŸ‚
*Setup* 

--- 
- :circle: Open the ``||game.Game||`` menu and drag a ``||game.on game update every [] ms||`` 
block into an empty spot on the coding canvas.


- :paper plane: Open the ``||sprites.Sprites||`` menu and drag a ``||sprite.set [projectile] from side||`` into the ``||game.on game update||`` container.

---

*Tip: Use the ğŸ’¡ to see if you're on the right track!*

```blocks
game.onUpdateInterval(500, function () {
    projectile = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        `, 50, 50)

```

## Step 4
ğŸ‚ **Code the falling collectible** ğŸ‚
*Sprite Creation* 

---
- :mouse pointer: In the ``||sprite.set [projectile] to||`` block, click the 
**grey oval** to open the Sprite Edior.

ğŸ¨ Create your own sprite, or click on the **Gallery Tab** at the top 
to choose one from the gallery.  Click the green **Done** button when you've finished.

---

*Click â–¶ to see the sprite move across the screen every 500 milliseconds (ms).*

## Step 5
ğŸ‚ **Code the falling collectible** ğŸ‚ 
*Parameter Changes* 

---
- :mouse pointer: In the ``||sprite.set [projectile] to||`` block, change ``||sprites.vx||`` 
to **0**.  Test out different numbers for ``||sprites.vy||``!


- :mouse pointer: In the ``||game.on game update every [] ms||`` container, click on **500** 
and test out different values from the drop-down.

---

*Click â–¶ to see how changing these parameters effects the projectile sprite.*

## Step 6
ğŸ‚ **Code the falling collectible** ğŸ‚ *Randomness* 

---
- :paper plane: Open the ``||sprites.Sprites||`` menu and drag a ``||sprites.set position||`` 
block into *the end* of the ``||game.on game update||`` container.

- :mouse pointer: Click on the ``||sprite.[mySprite]||`` bubble and select **projectile** 
from the drop-down.
 
### @diffs false
```blocks
game.onUpdateInterval(2000, function () {
    let projectile = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . e e . 
        . . . . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e . . 
        . . . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e . . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 7 7 e e 7 7 . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e 7 7 7 . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 e e 7 7 7 7 . . 
        . . . . 7 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 . . . 
        . . . 7 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . 
        . . . 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . 
        . . 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . 
        . . 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . . . 
        . . 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        `, 0, 50)
    projectile.setPosition(0, 0)
})
```

## Step 7
ğŸ‚ **Code the falling collectible** ğŸ‚ *Randomness* 

---
- :calculator: Open the ``||math.Math||`` menu and drag a ``||math.pick random||`` 
bubble into the ``||sprites.x||`` parameter bubble.

- :tree: Open the ``||scene.Scene||`` menu and drag a ``||scene.screen width||`` 
bubble into the **2nd** parameter bubble in ``||math.pick random||``.

---

*Use the ğŸ’¡ to see if you're on the right track!*

### @diffs true
```blocks
game.onUpdateInterval(2000, function () {
    let projectile = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . e e . 
        . . . . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e . . 
        . . . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e . . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 7 7 e e 7 7 . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 7 e e 7 7 7 . . 
        . . . . . 7 7 7 e e 7 7 7 7 . . 
        . . . . 7 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 . . . 
        . . . 7 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . 
        . . . 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . 
        . . 7 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . 
        . . 7 e 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . . . 
        . . 7 7 7 7 7 7 . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        `, 0, 50)
    projectile.setPosition(randint(0, scene.screenWidth()), 0)
})
```

## Step 8
ğŸ¤— **Code your thankful thoughts** ğŸ¤— *On Overlap* 

---
- :paper plane: Open the ``||sprites.Sprites||`` menu and drag a ``||sprites.on [sprite] of kind overlaps||`` 
container into an empty spot on the coding canvas.
- :mouse pointer: Click on the **2nd** ``||sprites.[Player]||`` bubble and select 
**Projectile** from the drop-down.

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Projectile, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    
})
```

## Step 9
ğŸ¤— **Code your thankful thoughts** ğŸ¤— *On Overlap* 

---
- :paper plane: Open the ``||sprites.Sprites||`` menu and drag a ``||sprites.destroy [mySprite]||`` 
block into the ``||sprites.on [sprite] overlap||`` container.
- :mouse pointer: Click and drag the ``||sprite.[otherSprite]||`` bubble into the ``||sprite.[mySprite]||`` 
parameter.

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Projectile, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    otherSprite.destroy()
})
```

## Step 10
ğŸ¤— **Code your thankful thoughts** ğŸ¤— *Speaking Sprites* 

---
- :paper plane: Open the ``||sprites.Sprites||`` menu and drag a ``||sprites.[mySprite] say||`` 
block into ``||sprites.on [sprite] overlaps||``.  
- :mouse pointer: In the ``||sprites.on [sprite] overlap||`` container, click and drag the ``||sprite.[sprite]||`` 
bubble to replace ``||sprite.[mySprite]||``.  

Type something you're thankful for into the block.  Click the white **+** sign 
to change how long it appears on screen.

---

*Click â–¶ and see the turkey speak when it overlaps with a falling object.*

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Projectile, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    otherSprite.destroy()
    sprite.sayText(":)", 500, false)
})
```

## Step 11
ğŸ¤— **Code your thankful thoughts** ğŸ¤— *Array of Thanks* 

---
- :list: Click on **Advanced**.  Open the ``||arrays.Arrays||`` menu and drag a ``||sprite.set [text list] to||`` 
block into the *end* of the ``||loops.on start||`` container.

**Add more things you're thankful for!**

In each parameter bubble, add a thing you're thankful for *(you can include the one you just used!)*.
Use the white **+** sign to add even more!

## Step 12
ğŸ¤— **Code your thankful thoughts** ğŸ¤— *Array of Thanks* 

---
- :list: Click on **Advanced**.  Open the ``||arrays.Arrays||`` menu and drag a 
``||arrays.get random value||`` bubble into the text parameter of the ``||sprites.[sprite] say||`` 
block.
- :mouse pointer: Click on the ``||sprite.[list]||`` bubble and select **text list** from 
the drop-down.

---

*Click â–¶ and see the turkey say a random item from your array of thankful things.*

```blocks
let text_list = ["friends", "family", "food"]
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Projectile, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    otherSprite.destroy()
    sprite.sayText(text_list._pickRandom(), 500, false)
})
```
